edu.xtec.jclic.bags

Class ActivitySequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.bags.ActivitySequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Editable, Domable

    public class ActivitySequence
extends Object
implements Editable, Domable
    This class stores the definition of the sequence of activities related to a specific JClicProject. The sequence are formed by an ordered list of objects of type ActivitySequenceElement, internally stored in a ArrayList. It stores also a transient pointer to a current element, and provides several methods useful to deal with sequences.
    Version:
    13.09.10
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)

        Parameters:
